about_the_game:
Dungeon of Theseus is a Rogue-lite deckbuilding auto-battler.
Enjoy the fun of deckbuilding without the hassle of playing cards. At the beginning of each round, three characters will be drawn from the deck, and the combat will proceed automatically. Character positioning combined with a great variety of skills from each character brings rich tactical choices.

To fight all kinds of monsters in the dungeon, you'll have to recruit more characters. Build your own party the way you want it to be. And of course they will not risk their own life for free! Pay wages on time, and you can leave everything else to your party members.

Feartures

1. Auto Battle Mechanism: At the beginning of each round, three characters will be drawn from your pre-constructed deck. Each of them has a special skill set, the battle will conduct itself automatically.

2. Dynamically constructed deck: Every character is a card. At the end of every round, you
may recruit a new character or upgrade existing ones. Skill combination is the key to success. Adjusting your party according to monsters you are facing is also a crucial part of strategy.

3.Positioning: Every character has a default position. A character whose default position is front normally has more hit points, capable of taking more damage. Characters with rear default position have less hp, but they are either good at damage dealing, or have a special skill to bring advantage to your team. While recruiting new members, it's important to
maintain the balance of each position in your deck.

4. Payday!: A more powerful character comes with higher wages. Chasing an all-star
team will crush party’s financial state, eventually leading to disbandment of the team. You will have to build your party both efficiently and economically.

5.Raise!: Your party members will occasionally ask for a raise. Approve it, a random upgrade will be given to the character. Disapprove it, he will leave the party. Manage your party carefully, only the fittest can survive!
